title: Drawing, "Chest: Five Drawers, Rectangular Pulls,  One per Drawer, Centered", 1930s
medium:
Graphite, red color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink: at center, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES; at lower right, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite at left. Inscribed in graphite: at center right, 5 Drawers; at lower right, Scale, [Deskey #] 7248

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chest: Five Drawers, Rectangular Pulls,  One per Drawer, Centered", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite, red color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1791.
